sentences.sContent: When I taught, I would assign a topic to children that they would write about.
sentences.sCn: 教书时，我会给孩子们布置个写作题。

sentences.sContent: ...we are not trying to assign blame or criticize anyone or call anyone conscious Its of this study to open up meaningful dialogues on implicit gender bias...
...so Dutt and her team could assign them a score without knowing the gender of the student...

remMethod.val: as ＋ sign(签名， 做记号) → 签名指派某人做某事 → 指派

words.tran: [经] 可分配的；可指定的；可让渡的
分配；约会；指定；[经] 转让

trans.tranOther: to give someone a particular job or make them responsible for a particular person or thing
